publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2795 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill - Suspension of Standing Ordersâ€”That the Parliament agrees that Rules 9.7.9, 9.8.3 and 9.10.2 of the Standing Orders be suspended for the purposes of the Criminal Procedure (Amendment) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Euan Robson*
